sense.def:
Decorations
so predmeti, ki jih nečemu dodamo, da je videti privlačnejše.

seg.quote: ...dresses that are free of all decoration.

sense.def:
The decoration of a room or building
so pohištvo, tapete in okrasni predmeti v neki sobi ali stavbi.

seg.quote: ...the style of decoration typical of the 1920s.

sense.def:
A decoration
je medalja, ki jo nekomu podelijo, kadar ga uradno počastijo.
